Summary: Tuxedo Park NY, several unexplained erratic lights
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tuxedo Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). Several lights appeared over the southern end of the largest lake inTuxedo (there are 3) There is not a air lane at this location, and with theexception of the rare military plane from Stewart or West Point no traffic.Lights kept appearing (blink on) travel towards the east, stop and double back.When I saw the 1st one it was unusual however by the 5th or 6th it wasremarkable. Cant say for sure what it was, other then out of the ordinary.
